Expert working groups that convene specialists to achieve technical consensus on species, ecosystems and methodologies.
A member‑based governance model that embeds scientific cooperation within a diplomatic framework, preserving national sovereignty while promoting shared methods and recommendations.
Large, centralized data repositories and long‑term monitoring programmes that enable robust stock assessments and detection of decadal trends.
